release.description: This release of the Product Search User Interface is a component of the integrated release 9.0.0 of the PDS4 System. This is an operational release of the system components to date.
release.action: Added Google Analytics to website header.
Updated for the web site redesign.

release.description: This release of the Product Search User Interface is a component of the integrated release 4.0.0 of the PDS4 System. This is an operational release of the system components to date.
release.action: Copied search-ui package to make this product-search-ui package. Updated pom, assembly, etc. As needed.
Updated search.jsp to reference product search end point.
Update the documentation to be specific to product-search-ui. Also added diagram detailing how the interface communicates with the Search Service.
